data.title: Albert II and Paola, The King and Queen of the Belgians Golden Wedding Anniversary
data.meta_description: Royal response from Their Majesties The King and Queen of the Belgians on the occasion of their Golden (50th) wedding anniversary. The couple married on 2nd July 1959 in a civil ceremony at the Brussels Town Hall and a religious ceremony at the Cathedral of Saint Michel and Saint Gudule in Brussels. They have three…
data.text:
Royal response from Their Majesties The King and Queen of the Belgians on the occasion of their Golden (50th) wedding anniversary.

The couple married on 2nd July 1959 in a civil ceremony at the Brussels Town Hall and a religious ceremony at the Cathedral of Saint Michel and Saint Gudule in Brussels. They have three children.

The reply is in the form of a card which on the front has two pictures of Their Majesties one on top been from 1959 and the bottom one is from 2009. Inside is a message from each of Their Majesties with The Queen’s been in Dutch and The King’s in French.

Card

Front of Card

Messages

Translation

Paola, The Queen of the Belgians, Dutch: Thank you very much for your sweet wishes, which attaches a long time where the heart has gone.

Albert II, The King of The Belgians, French; Thank you very much for your wishes on our wedding anniversary.
